# seafile

The goal of seafile is to connect to seafile API using R.
This Is a partial implementation, PR welcome ;)

## Installation

``` r
remotes::install_github("VincentGuyader/seafile")
```

## Example

<https://vincentguyader.github.io/seafile/>
